thread.title: BRIEF-ProMIS Neurosciences Lead Product Candidate For Alzheimer's Disease Shows Potential For Improved Therapeutic Potency

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-ProMIS Neurosciences Lead Product Candidate For Alzheimer's Disease Shows Potential For Improved Therapeutic Potency
text:
March 6 (Reuters) - ProMIS Neurosciences Inc:
* PROMIS NEUROSCIENCES LEAD PRODUCT CANDIDATE FOR ALZHEIMERâ€™S DISEASE SHOWS POTENTIAL FOR IMPROVED THERAPEUTIC POTENCY VERSUS OTHER AMYLOID BETA-DIRECTED ANTIBODIES
* PROMIS NEUROSCIENCES INC - PMN310 SHOWED SIMILAR ABILITY TO CROSS BLOOD BRAIN BARRIER AND PENETRATE CENTRAL NERVOUS SYSTEM COMPARED TO ADUCANUMAB Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
